contents.name: mdi-cust-icons
contents.title: Defines additional icons used in the customization
contents.description: Space-separated icons identifiers. See the icons available at <xref href="https://pictogrammers.github.io/@mdi/font/6.6.96/" format="html" scope="external">https://pictogrammers.github.io/@mdi/font/6.6.96/</xref>.
